value:
There is nothing else for me to learn
in the classroom. I need real combat
training. This is just the place!

My knowledge of combat tactics,
pegasus handling, and lancework
could use some improvement!

I appreciate your concern, but I am
fine.

This castle's library is quite well
organized. However, there were a few
minor errors I saw to on my day off.

My skills are no match for those of
my father's, so I must take my
training seriously.

I am Caeldori, daughter of Subaki,
a sky knight of utter perfection. I have
a gift for you, to offer a friendly hello.

Darting Blow! I'd say that wasn't too
bad... But it's still a far cry from what
my father could do.

As long as my feet are planted on the
battlefield, I will use every ounce of
knowledge and skill I possess to win!

I can't wrap my head around it...
What could have gone wrong?

Thank you for looking out for me.
I'm not always so sure about myself.

Hello, nice to meet you. I'm Caeldori,
daughter of Subaki, a sky knight of
Hoshido. I strive to be perfect like him.

Eek, $Nu!$k$pHuh? O-oh, this book? Um, I-I was
just a bit interested, and...$k$pNo, no, I have no need for anything
like this! I mean I, um, you know, have
a wealth of romantic experience!$k$pNope, not me, I certainly don't have
any troubles with love... *sigh* I'm
sorry. I didn't mean to hide it.$k$pBut the person I'm in love with is...
Hey, actually, I have a question.
Is there anyone you're interested in?$k$pOh, um, I'm just asking as a friend!
Say your goodbyes!
I want to help!
I won't disappoint you.
You're not gonna like this!
Is this how it ends...
I'm Caeldori, daughter of Subaki. It's wonderful to meet you!
Ah! Gods, you caught me in a daydream.
Is there a library here? I've  committed most of the books I have at home to memory.
I'm not particularly concerned about my physique.
Why do I always fall in love with men who never love me back?
My father is just perfect! I have to work as hard as I can to catch up to him.
Don't worry, I'll keep training hard to improve!
How can I help?
Need me?
I'll handle it.
